about_the_game:
We are proud to introduce a new set of truck tires and truck accessories, officially licensed from Goodyear to American Truck Simulator. The Goodyear Tires Pack DLC comes not only with a range of long-lasting tires, but also with a range of additional cabin accessories and paint jobs to decorate your truck with.

Goodyear tires are the product of over 120 years of innovation and state-of-the-art technology, offering very high levels of performance and safety. As one of the world's largest tire companies, Goodyear continues to push the envelope with new innovations in tires and ‘beyond tires’ setting the standard in the industry.

Tires:


Steer Tires:
  • Goodyear Endurance LHS
  • Goodyear G296 MSA

Drive Tires:
  • Goodyear Endurance LHD
  • Goodyear Fuel Max RTD
  • Goodyear Fuel Max SSD ft. DuraSeal

Trailer Tires:
  • Goodyear Fuel Max LHT
  • Goodyear Fuel Max G316 LHT
  • Goodyear Fuel Max G316 LHT ft. DuraSeal
  • Goodyear Fuel Max SST ft. DuraSeal

Extra custom-designed rims for truck:


Front:
  • Seagul Deep Blue
  • Seagul Wide Deep Blue

Rear:
  • Seagul Deep Blue
  • Seagul Wide Deep Blue

Extra custom-designed rims for trailer:


  • Seagul Deep Blue
  • Seagul Wide Deep Blue

Paint Jobs:


  • Goodyear Origins
  • Goodyear High Line

Cabin Accessories:

  • Wingfoot Air Freshener
  • Goodyear Blimp Model
  • Goodyear Cap
  • Goodyear Wallet
  • Goodyear Notebook
  • Goodyear Coffee Mug
  • Goodyear Money Box
  • Goodyear Mints
  • Goodyear Mug
  • Goodyear Pillow
  • Goodyear Logo Sticker
  • Goodyear Old Logo Sticker
  • Goodyear Weekend Bag
detailed_description:
Meanwhile on the other side of the pond

Like what you see? Then check out the Goodyear Tyres Pack for Euro Truck Simulator 2!


About the Game

We are proud to introduce a new set of truck tires and truck accessories, officially licensed from Goodyear to American Truck Simulator. The Goodyear Tires Pack DLC comes not only with a range of long-lasting tires, but also with a range of additional cabin accessories and paint jobs to decorate your truck with.

Goodyear tires are the product of over 120 years of innovation and state-of-the-art technology, offering very high levels of performance and safety. As one of the world's largest tire companies, Goodyear continues to push the envelope with new innovations in tires and ‘beyond tires’ setting the standard in the industry.

Tires:


Steer Tires:
  • Goodyear Endurance LHS
  • Goodyear G296 MSA

Drive Tires:
  • Goodyear Endurance LHD
  • Goodyear Fuel Max RTD
  • Goodyear Fuel Max SSD ft. DuraSeal

Trailer Tires:
  • Goodyear Fuel Max LHT
  • Goodyear Fuel Max G316 LHT
  • Goodyear Fuel Max G316 LHT ft. DuraSeal
  • Goodyear Fuel Max SST ft. DuraSeal

Extra custom-designed rims for truck:


Front:
  • Seagul Deep Blue
  • Seagul Wide Deep Blue

Rear:
  • Seagul Deep Blue
  • Seagul Wide Deep Blue

Extra custom-designed rims for trailer:


  • Seagul Deep Blue
  • Seagul Wide Deep Blue

Paint Jobs:


  • Goodyear Origins
  • Goodyear High Line

Cabin Accessories:

  • Wingfoot Air Freshener
  • Goodyear Blimp Model
  • Goodyear Cap
  • Goodyear Wallet
  • Goodyear Notebook
  • Goodyear Coffee Mug
  • Goodyear Money Box
  • Goodyear Mints
  • Goodyear Mug
  • Goodyear Pillow
  • Goodyear Logo Sticker
  • Goodyear Old Logo Sticker
  • Goodyear Weekend Bag

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 64-bit
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450-class (Intel HD 4000)
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760-class (2 GB)
  • Storage: 20 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9 (Mavericks)
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450-class (Intel HD 4000)
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.10 (Yosemite)
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760-class (Intel HD 5300)
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
